content: Is the use of http://gforge.hl7.org appropriate to report minor glitches in the Standard? e.g. under http://build.fhir.org/search.html#sort there is a sentence "The client can indicate which order to return the results by using the parameter _sort, which can contains a comma-separated list of sort rules in priority order" where either "can" must be removed or "contains" must be "contain" (To the best of my non-native speaker knowledge :-).
